page.title: 16Aberystwyth news. (cont.)
page.content: {Accommodation needed for the elderly.} District Councillers are to look for locations in Aberystwyth to provide more housing for elderly people.There are between 150 and 200 old age pensioniers waiting for Accommodation. {Royal invite for Aber. youth worker. 23 yr. old Margaret Meredith organiser of the Corner stone,a youth meeting place,has been invited to dine with Prince Charles because of her community work.{Â£34,000 price put on {land for new Welsh school.}A new school will be built at Plascrug. {Youth Training Scheme(YTS) for school {and college leavers is now going to {organise more courses in Carpet {fitting,Printing,Specilist furniture} {and Estate Agency work. { Mother Finds Chair Near Open Windows A baby died after falling from an open window at Bronglais Hospital.
